This movie is nothing short of a dark, gritty masterpiece. I may be bias, as the Apartheid era is an area I've always felt for South Africa. The problems with the story from a cultural pov stem from being ignorant about local customs and politicians managing to get everything sorted despite another war with more casualties going on at the time (judge).
